Articles.Content:
Hey all, just a quick question.

Do the spoiler tags work on the forum at all? I've tried surrounding pictures with

and

tags, but no button appears

I feel bad when I post a bunch of pictures and take up a large portion of the page.

Thanks!
If I remember correctly, they were turned off a month or two ago due to security concerns.
there was something wrong with them so they turned them off.
